paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2-G628S variant, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: localized prolongation of effective refractory period and elimination of ventricular arrhythmia inducibility
individual_records.evidence_sentence: We found that gene transfer of the dominant negative KCNH2-G628S mutation to the anteroseptal infarct border caused localized prolongation of effective refractory period in the target region and eliminated all ventricular arrhythmia inducibility.

functional_data.summary: The KCNH2-G628S mutation was shown to affect the effective refractory period and arrhythmia inducibility.

variants.additional_notes: The study focuses on the functional impact of the KCNH2-G628S variant in an animal model.
key_quotes: gene transfer of the dominant negative KCNH2-G628S mutation to the anteroseptal infarct border caused localized prolongation of effective refractory period in the target region and eliminated all ventricular arrhythmia inducibility.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly mentioned in the main text.
